basis: The user commits to practicing 1â€“2 cafe phrases tonight, keeps the urge-kit ready, logs cravings/mood, requests digital deliverables (PDF and wallpaper), and plans a gradual rollout with a next outing. This shows concrete upcoming actions aligned with the plan.
cognitive_dissonance: Low. The user expresses a gradual, flexible approach with clear intention, and no strong conflicting beliefs are evident.
negative_thought_patterns: Minor worry about social settings (family dinners) and potential perfectionism about rapidly integrating all cues; no pervasive negative self-talk.
emotional_triggers: Social eating contexts (cafe/dessert cues, family meals), travel/varying schedules, peer pressure around desserts.
coaching_notes: Keep delivering concrete, bite-sized steps and deliverables (PDF/wallpaper) to support gradual adoption. Consider adding tailored family-dinner lines in a future update. Encourage consistent logging and quick feedback after outings to fine-tune tomorrow's plan.
